name: Island Hopper (Daniel Brooks)
description:
Island Hopper is a little project I started as I wanted to create a game in this style. Whist I have released the game, it is in alpha meaning there are many things I need to change and add to the game before its final state and release. Any feedback would be appreciated for its development. 

Website - https://danjbrooks99.wixsite.com/danbrooks
